### Usage 

This component currently adds support to export the Google maps topography styles. 
The idea is that the styles can be directly imported from this component intead of manually copy them from the [Google Maps Styling File](/api/static/documentation/components/map-topography/181115_D6_maps_styling.json)

#### Example:
To ensure a consistent map styling, within your project, import the MapTopographyStyles from components-core and add them as a styles option to the GoogleMap react component.


```ts
import {MapTopographyStyles} from '@vwa/components-core';
import GoogleMap from 'google-map-react';

...

<GoogleMap
	options={
		styles: MapTopographyStyles
	}
>
...
```


[![Map topography usage](/api/static/documentation/components/map-topography/map-topography_usage.png)](/api/static/documentation/components/map-topography/map-topography_usage.png)
